ORSHIN Attack Defense Framework

EMFI Attack against USB STACK

Description

EMFI Attack against USB STACK

CWE

1319

CVE

Attack Surfaces

Controller Implementation (MITRE EMB3D PID-11)

SoloKey

USB Stack

Attack Vectors

Electromagnetic Side-Channel (MITRE EMB3D TID-102)

FA (MITRE EMB3D TID-105)

Defenses

Protection against Read Past End of Buffer Attacks, Do Not Store Sensitive Data in Memory too Close to USB Descriptors, Use Memory Protection Unit, Limit Response Sizes by Using a Mask in USB Stack, Random Timing Jitter
